full_name: AP Board of Secondary Education (BSEAP) / Telangana Board of Secondary Education (BSETS)

ssc_class_9_10.structure_note: Paper has TWO physical parts. Part A (Objective, 20 marks) is collected after 30 minutes. Part B (Written, 80 marks) continues for remaining time.

PART_A_OBJECTIVE.handover_instruction: Part A question paper must be submitted to the invigilator at the end of 30 minutes.

sections.instruction: Choose correct answer. Write the letter in the bracket against the question.
Fill in the blank with correct answer.
Match Group-A with Group-B. Write the letter in the bracket.
sections.format: Two-column table: Group A (5 items) | Group B (5 items)

sections.instruction: Answer ALL questions. Each carries 2 marks. Answer in not more than 5 lines.
Answer any FOUR of the following six questions. Each carries 4 marks. Answer in not more than one page.
Answer any FOUR of the following six questions. Each carries 6 marks. Answer in not more than two pages.
sections.note: Each question may have internal choice indicated by OR.

sections.instruction: Answer any TWO of the following three questions. Each carries 10 marks.
sections.note: Numericals, proofs, derivations, constructions, map activity, or application problems depending on subject.

PART_B_WRITTEN.total_check: Section IV(20) + Section V(16) + Section VI(24) + Section VII(20) = 80

general_instructions: 1. Answer all questions under Part-A on the question paper itself and attach it to the answer booklet at the end of the examination.
2. Read the instructions carefully and answer only the required number of questions in each section.
3. Figures to the right indicate marks allotted.
4. Neat and fully labelled diagrams must be drawn wherever required.
5. In case of any ambiguity in translation, the English version shall be treated as final.
6. Write the question number and sub-question number clearly.

subject_specifics.Mathematics: Section VII: construction OR proof of theorem OR numerical. All steps must be shown with reasons.
subject_specifics.Science_Physics_Chemistry: Paper 1 (Physics + Chemistry): Section VII has numericals. Show formula, substitution, calculation, unit.
subject_specifics.Science_Biology: Paper 2 (Biology + part Chemistry): Section VII has labelled diagram drawing OR detailed paragraph. Diagrams must be large, neat, fully labelled.
subject_specifics.Social_Studies: Section VII includes map-marking question â€” students mark specific items on outline map of India or World. Also includes source/document analysis.
subject_specifics.English: No Part A for English. Full paper is descriptive: Reading (comprehension), Writing (letter/essay/notice), Grammar (transformation, editing).

classes_6_8.exam_type: Summative Assessment (SA1 in October, SA2 in March)
